<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Traveling Lead Fleet Diesel Technician/Mechanic]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[Description
  

  

  
   
  
   Pay range up to 32.00 per hour based on experience !   
  
   
  
   $3500.00 Sign on bonus      
  
 A. Duie Pyle currently has an opening for a Traveling Lead Diesel Technician/Mechanic based out of  Allentown, Pa or Wilkes-Barre, Pa.. - Class A/B with top rates, premier benefits, and job stability! 
  
 
  
 Lead position comes wit $1.00 per hour extra. 
  
 
  
SUMMARY:
  
 
  
In this position you will be required to travel throughout twenty one Fleet Maintenance Facilities within A Duie Pyle’s network, located in the Northeast and perform maintenance related repairs on Class 8 Trucks, Trailers and Forklifts. As a Lead Technician, you will also be tasked with scheduling equipment repairs, addressing administration duties, vendor relations, train new hires employee’s and supporting the local technician team with complex diagnostic repairs. This position will require 90 percent overnight travel to effectively support the shops throughout our foot print.
  
 
  
  ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 
  
 
  
 
  
+ Travel to outlying Fleet Maintenance Facilities providing maintenance support for the local terminal
  
 
  
+ Performing preventative maintenance, troubleshooting, repairs, and modifications to assigned equipment
  
 
  
+ Providing New Hire training on policies, procedures and fleet maintenance software
  
 
  
+ Troubleshooting electric systems and complex after treatment repairs  
  
 
  
+ Assisting with daily Administrative duties
  
 
  
+ Coordinating daily repairs and work flow for shops
  
 
  
+ Supporting Terminal Operations with equipment issues and relaying out of service events
  
 
  
+ Assisting with breakdowns and vendor related issues
  
 
  
 
  
Watch our Video-https://vimeo.com/511212424
  
 
  
This is a unique opportunity to join a family-owned, industry-leading, employee-focused company.
  
 
  
Our employees also enjoy the security of working with an industry leader and a premier benefit package including: medical, dental, vision, life insurance, accident insurance, 401(k) with company match and profit sharing retirement plan.  Other benefits include: short and long term disability, flexible spending accounts and weekly pay through direct deposit.
  
 
  
 QUALIFICATIONS:  
  
 
  
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform eachessential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
  
 
  
 
  
+ Strong knowledge of class 8 tractor and trailer maintenance and DOT/OSHA guidelines
  
 
  
+ Must have a compliment of tools required to perform most Class 8 repairs
  
 
  
+ Familiar with the systems relative to today’s heavy-duty equipment
  
 
  
+ Must have 5 plus years of maintenance experience in a fleet maintenance environment
  
 
  
+ Strong computer skills and proficient in: Microsoft Word, Excel and Outlook
  
 
  
+ Must be able to multi-task
  
 
  
+  90 percent travel time or more is required 
  
 
  
+ Good written and strong oral communication skills
  
 
  
+ CDL/State Inspection a plus
  
 
  
+ Must be able to obtain and maintain TSA security clearance
  
 
  
 
  
 EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE 
  
 
  
 
  
+ High school Diploma and Industry Management Experience
  
 
  
 
  
For more information call 800-733-4596
  
 
  
A. Duie Pyle is the Northeast’s premier integrated supply chain solutions provider ideally equipped in servicing the congested Northeast metropolitan region. Family-owned since 1924 and with over 3,200 employees, A. Duie Pyle provides engineered logistics solutions and consultative services utilizing our vast network of 24 LTL Service Centers, 11 strategically located warehouses, Dedicated fleet operations and specialized truckload services through Pyle Logistics.
  
 
  
We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
Keywords: diesel tech, Mechanics, Diesel engine or diesel mechanic, Fleet Service Technician, Diesel Tractor Engine Mechanic, Truck foreman/diesel tech, Truck, Railroad, and Bus Engine Mechanic, Fleet Maintenance Mechanic, Truck, Railroad, and Bus Motor Mechanic, Truck, Railroad, and Bus Tune Up Mechanic, Fleet Service Mechanic, Heavy Truck Mechanic, Diesel Mechanic/Truck Driver, Mechanic, Welder, Truck Driver, Fleet Technician, Tractor Trailer Mechanic, Industrial Truck Mechanic, Truck Trailer Mechanic, Diesel Service Technician, Diesel Engine Mechanic, Tank Truck Mechanic, Diesel Mechanic, Fleet Mechanic or Truck Mechanic, Installation and Repair

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Fleet Diesel Technician/Mechanic 3rd shift]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[Description
  

  
    Pay range up to $40.00 per hour based on experience !       $5,000 Sign on bonus      
  
 A Duie Pyle currently has positions open for Fleet Diesel Technician/Mechanic in Carteret, NJ with top rates, premier benefits, and job stability! 
  
 
  
We also offer a shift differential of $3.00 per hour  for 3rd shift
  
 
  
This is a unique opportunity to join a stable, family-owned, industry-leading, employee-focused company since 1924.
  
 
  
Job Description: 
  
 
  
 
  
+ Performing Routine Preventative Maintenance and Repairs on Late Model Equipment
  
 
  
+ Troubleshooting / Repairing, Brakes, Air Systems, Electrical, Suspension, Air Conditioning, etc.
  
 
  
+ Diagnosing / Repairing, Engine Electrical and Exhaust After-Treatment (will train right person)
  
 
  
+ Perform Basic Trailer Maintenance and Repairs Including Lift-Gates and Heater Units
  
 
  
 
  
Watch our Video-https://vimeo.com/511212424
  
 
  
Job Requirements: 
  
 
  
 
  
+ HS Diploma or equivalent
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
+ Vocational or Technical Training in diesel / heavy-duty vehicle (preferred)
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
+ Minimum of 3 years recent experience repairing/maintaining Class 8 trucks & trailers
  
 
  
+ Must have a complete set of hand tools for a heavy duty truck technician
  
 
  
+ Must be able to read and comprehend service and repair manuals
  
 
  
+ Basic computer skills
  
 
  
+ Must be able to work independently with minimal supervision
  
 
  
+ Good decision making ability
  
 
  
+ Valid driver's license (CDL a plus but not required)
  
 
  
 
  
Benefits:
  
 
  
 
  
+ 401(k) with company match
  
 
  
+ Annual Profit Sharing Retirement Plan
  
 
  
+ Paid Vacation
  
 
  
+ Paid Personal Time
  
 
  
+ Paid Holidays (8)
  
 
  
+ Paid Weekly via Direct Deposit
  
 
  
+ Medical Insurance
  
 
  
+ Dental Insurance
  
 
  
+ Vision Insurance
  
 
  
+ Life Insurance
  
 
  
+ Short Term & Long Term Disability
  
 
  
+ Annual Tool Allowance Program
  
 
  
+ Uniforms Provided
  
 
  
+ Continual Training
  
 
  
 
  
For more information, click link below or call 800-733-4596 or visit www.Pylejobs.com
  
 
  
Founded in 1924 as a one-truck operation, A. Duie Pyle has grown to become the Northeast’s premier LTL (less-than-truckload), Dedicated and Warehouse provider.  As a family-owned company with over 3,200 employees, 24 LTL Service Centers, 11 strategically located warehouse and a Dedicated Fleet Operation, A. Duie Pyle has a proven track-record of investing in its people, facilities, and equipment.
  
 
  
We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, pregnancy, age, national origin, disability status, genetic information, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

        <description><![CDATA[Description
